languages.text: "Если бы я знал, я бы не задавался этим вопросом, {name}. Кажется..." {n}Дознаватель умолкает, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то.{/n} "Этот обруч на моей голове не заглушал мои силы — он обратил их вовнутрь. Замкнул в моем теле. Я сам... я сам мучил себя силами варпа и сам пережигал и уродовал свое нутро... проклятые ксеносы!" {n}Хейнрикс сжимает от ярости кулаки и тут же кривится от боли.{/n}

"If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если бы я знал, я бы не задавался этим вопросом, {name}. Кажется..." {n}Дознаватель умолкает, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то.{/n} "Этот обруч на моей голове не заглушал мои силы — он обратил их вовнутрь. Замкнул в моем теле. Я сам... я сам мучил себя силами варпа и сам пережигал и уродовал свое нутро... проклятые ксеносы!" {n}Хейнрикс сжимает от ярости кулаки и тут же кривится от боли.{/n}

They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

languages.text: 「もし知っていたら、今この問題について考えることはなかっただろう、{name}。たぶんな…」{n}彼は立ち止まり、何かに耳を傾けているようだ。{/n}「頭のサークレットは俺の能力を阻害していたのではなく、内側に向かわせていたのだ。俺の体内に縛り付けている。〈歪み〉のエネルギーに苦しめられ…内臓を焼かれ、切り刻まれた…クソ異種族め！」{n}ハインリックスは怒りに拳を握りしめたが、すぐに痛みでうずくまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もし知っていたら、今この問題について考えることはなかっただろう、{name}。たぶんな…」{n}彼は立ち止まり、何かに耳を傾けているようだ。{/n}「頭のサークレットは俺の能力を阻害していたのではなく、内側に向かわせていたのだ。俺の体内に縛り付けている。〈歪み〉のエネルギーに苦しめられ…内臓を焼かれ、切り刻まれた…クソ異種族め！」{n}ハインリックスは怒りに拳を握りしめたが、すぐに痛みでうずくまった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果我知道这是为什么，我就不会思考这个问题了，{name}。我认为……”{n}他顿了顿，似乎在聆听什么。{/n}“我头上的圆环根本没有抑制我的能力，而是把我的能力引到了身体内部，把它束缚在了我自己的身体里。他们让我用我自己的亚空间力量折磨我自己……是我自己烧坏了我的内脏……那些该死的异形！”{n}海因里希愤怒地攥紧了拳头，随后立刻由于疼痛而咳嗽起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果我知道这是为什么，我就不会思考这件事情了，{name}。我认为……”{n}他顿了顿，似乎在聆听什么。{/n}“我头上的圆环根本没有抑制我的能力，而是把我的能力引到了身体内部，把它束缚在了我自己的身体里。他们让我用我自己的亚空间力量折磨我自己……是我自己烧坏了我的内脏……那些该死的异形！”{n}海因里希愤怒地攥紧了拳头，随后立刻由于疼痛而咳嗽起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Si lo supiera, no estaría dándole vueltas a todo esto ahora mismo, {name}. Creo que...». {n}Hace una pausa, como si escuchara algo.{/n} «La diadema que llevaba en la cabeza no inhibía mis capacidades, sino que las dirigía hacia mi interior. Las ataba al interior de mi cuerpo. Me hacían torturarme con energías de la disformidad... Quemaba y mutilaba mis órganos internos... ¡Malditos xenos!». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños con furia e inmediatamente hace una mueca de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si lo supiera, no estaría dándole vueltas al asunto ahora mismo, {name}. Creo que...». {n}Hace una pausa, como si escuchara algo.{/n} «La diadema que llevaba en la cabeza no inhibía mis capacidades, sino que las dirigía hacia mi interior. Las ataba al interior de mi cuerpo. Me hacían torturarme con energías de la disformidad... Quemaba y mutilaba mis órganos internos... ¡Malditos xenos!». {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños con furia e inmediatamente hace una mueca de dolor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich das wüsste, würde ich gerade nicht über die Frage nachdenken, {name}. Ich glaube ..." {n}Er hält inne, offenbar, um nach etwas zu lauschen.{/n} "Der Reif auf meinem Kopf hat meine Fähigkeiten nicht gedämpft — er hat sie nach innen gerichtet. Hat sie in meinen Körper gekehrt. Sie haben dafür gesorgt, dass ich mich selbst mit Warp-Energien foltere ... Ich habe meine inneren Organe verbrannt und verstümmelt ... Verfluchte Xenos!" {n}Heinrix ballt zornig die Faust und verzieht sofort vor Schmerzen das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich das wüsste, würde ich gerade nicht über die Angelegenheit nachdenken, {name}. Ich glaube ..." {n}Er hält inne, offenbar, um nach etwas zu lauschen.{/n} "Der Reif auf meinem Kopf hat meine Fähigkeiten nicht gedämpft — er hat sie nach innen gerichtet. Hat sie in meinen Körper gekehrt. Sie haben dafür gesorgt, dass ich mich selbst mit Warp-Energien foltere ... Ich habe meine inneren Organe verbrannt und verstümmelt ... Verfluchte Xenos!" {n}Heinrix ballt zornig die Faust und verzieht sofort vor Schmerzen das Gesicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si je le savais, je ne me poserais pas la question, {name}. Je crois... » {n}Il marque une pause, comme s'il tendait l'oreille pour entendre quelque chose.{/n} « L'engin qui enserrait ma tête n'avait pas pour fonction d'inhiber mes capacités, mais au contraire de les intérioriser. De les lier dans mon corps. Ils m'ont forcé à me torturer moi-même avec les énergies du Warp... À brûler et mutiler mes propres organes internes... Maudits xénos ! » {n}Furieux, Heinrix serre les poings, mais ce simple geste le fait tressaillir de douleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si je le savais, je ne me poserais pas moi-même la question, {name}. Je crois... » {n}Il marque une pause, comme s'il tendait l'oreille pour entendre quelque chose.{/n} « L'engin qui enserrait ma tête n'avait pas pour fonction d'inhiber mes capacités, mais au contraire de les intérioriser. De les lier dans mon corps. Ils m'ont forcé à me torturer moi-même avec les énergies du Warp... À brûler et mutiler mes propres organes internes... Maudits xénos ! » {n}Furieux, Heinrix serre les poings, mais ce simple geste le fait tressaillir de douleur.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bilseydim şu an ben de bunu düşünüyor olmazdım {name}. Sanırım..." {n}Duraksıyor, bir şeyi dinlemeye koyulmuş gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Bana giydirilen başlık, kabiliyetlerimi bastırmak için değilmiş... Kabiliyetlerimi içe döndürmek içinmiş. Gücümü kendi bedenimin içine hapsetmiş. Kendi kendime öteboyut enerjisiyle işkence ettirmişler... Kendi iç organlarımı yakıp sakat bırakmışım... Kahrolası zenolar!" {n}Heinrix, öfkeyle yumruklarını sıkıp sonrasında acıdan yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If I knew, I wouldn't be pondering the question right now, {name}. I think..." {n}He pauses, seemingly listening to something.{/n} "The circlet on my head wasn't inhibiting my abilities — it was turning them inward. Binding them inside my body. They made me torture myself with warp energies... I was burning and mutilating my internal organs... Damned xenos!" {n}Heinrix clenches his fists in fury and immediately winces from the pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bilseydim şu an ben de bunu düşünüyor olmazdım {name}. Sanırım..." {n}Duraksayıp bir şeyleri dinliyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Bana giydirilen başlık, kabiliyetlerimi bastırmak için değilmiş... Kabiliyetlerimi içe döndürmek içinmiş. Gücümü kendi bedenimin içine hapsetmiş. Kendi kendime öteboyut enerjisiyle işkence etmemi sağlamışlar... Kendi iç organlarımı yakıp sakat bırakmışım... Kahrolası zenolar!" {n}Heinrix, öfkeyle yumruklarını sıkıp hemen acıdan yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
